alert.note: Alert for Coke; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:49PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Coke and northeastern Tom Green Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 947 PM CDT, thunderstorms in southern Coke county and northern tom Green county near Water Valley were moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carlsbad, Water Valley, Grape Creek and Us-87 Near The Coke- Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for west central Texas.
